short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast switch between tabs and windows. Quick search filter. Export all open URLs with a click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* Seamless Tab and Window Switching:

Tab Switcher+ provides a seamless and intuitive way to navigate through your open tabs and windows. With a single click, you can see all open tabs and windows and effortlessly switch between all of them. No more wasting time trying to locate the right tab or window â€“ get them in one ordered list and make your browsing experience more efficient.

* Smart Search Filtering

Tired of scrolling through a long list of windows, not knowing where the wanted tab is? Tab Switcher+ includes a smart search filter that allows you to quickly find the desired tab. Simply start typing in your keyword, and extension will filter the results, displaying only the relevant items. Say goodbye to tab overload and quickly locate the content you need with ease.

* Export Open URLs with a Click

Need to keep track of all your open URLs? Tab Switcher+ makes it easy to export a comprehensive list of all your open URLs with just a click. Whether you want to save it for reference or share it with others, the "Copy to Clipboard" feature provides a convenient way to manage and organize your browsing sessions.
